Welcome to Cyber S1 - Python’s documentation!¶

ex01¶

ex01.main.main(line)¶

Return the speed.

After sanitizing the input (line), this function compute the speed.

Parameters

line (string) – line in input, format : FLOAT<temps>;FLOAT<distance>

Raises

  • Exception – 100 - BAD INPUT: You need to enter 2 values

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: Values are not digits or are less than 0!

  • Exception – 300 - BAD INPUT: Time must be greater than 0!

Returns

speed

Return type

float2

ex02¶

ex02.main.main(line)¶

Compute square root of a number.

Parameters

line (string) – line readed from file containing a float

Raises

  • Exception – 100 - BAD INPUT: Not a float

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: Failed casting to float

Returns

value

Return type

float

ex03¶

ex03.main.main(line)¶

Return the speed.

After sanitizing the input (line), this function compute the speed.

Parameters

line (string) – line in input, format : STR<mot1>;STR<mot2>

Raises

  • Exception – 100 - BAD INPUT: You need to enter 2 values

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: The program failed to compare the two words

  • Exception – 300 - BAD INPUT: Values are not words! (Sentences are not allowed)

Returns

(wordX, iddentical)

Return type

(str, boolean)

ex04¶

ex04.main.main(line)¶

Return the status.

Return the status of the enclosure with the parameters pressure, volume.

Parameters

line (string) – line in input, format : FLOAT<pression>;FLOAT<volume>

Raises

  • Exception – 100 - BAD INPUT: You need to enter 2 values

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: Values are not digits or are less than 0!

Returns

{“KO”,”Augmenter”,”Diminuer”,”OK”}

Return type

str

ex06.main.main(line)¶

Parameters

Raises

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: Failed casting to float

Returns

volumeSphere(value)

Return type

ex06.main.volumeSphere(r)¶

Return the volume of a sphere of radius r.

Parameters

r (float) – raise

Returns

4 / 3 * np.pi * cube(r)

Return type

float

ex07.main.main(line)¶

Exception – if BAD INPUT

ret

Return type

ex07.main.tabuler(fonction, borneInf, borneSup, nbPas)¶

Compute fonction for values from borneInf to borneSup each nbPas.

Parameters

  • fonction (function) – function(x)

  • borneInf (float) – lower boundary

  • borneSup (float) – higher boundary

  • nbPas (int) – step

Returns

value

Return type

array[float]

ex13¶

ex13.main.CompterMots(sentence)¶

Return the number of occurence of each word in sentence.

Parameters

sentence (string) – line in input

Raises

  • Exception – 100 - BAD INPUT: You need to enter 2 values

  • Exception – 200 - BAD INPUT: Values are not digits or are less than 0!

Returns

{‘word1’: nbOfWord1, ‘word2’: nbOfWord2, …}

Return type

{‘STR’: INT, ‘STR’: INT, ..}
